text: Dato' Subahan bin Kamal (Jawi: سوبهن بن كمال; born 26 December 1965) is a Malaysian politician and was the member of the Selangor State Legislative Assembly for Taman Templer from 2008 to 2013. He is a member of the governing United Malays National Organisation (UMNO) party. He held position as the president of the Football Association of Selangor from February 2017 until July 2018. He is currently the president of Malaysian Hockey Confederation, had been holding the position since 2015. ==Early life== ==Career== Subahan worked at Bank Rakyat from 1989 until 1994 where he joined the corporate planning department. On 1994, he started working as the private secretary to the parliamentary secretary of Ministry of Finance until 1995. He then became the senior private secretary to the Deputy Finance Minister from 1995 to 1998, serving Affifudin Omar, Wong See Wah and Mohamed Nazri Abdul Aziz respectively. Subahan become senior private secretary to the Deputy Human Resource Minister, Afifudin Omar on 1999. ==Involvement in sports== ==Honours== ==References== Category:1965 births Category:People from Selangor Category:Living people Category:United Malays National Organisation politicians Category:Malaysian people of Malay descent Category:Malaysian Muslims Category:Members of the Selangor State Legislative Assembly
title: Subahan Kamal
